heading_7: Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs) about Singapore e-Sim
content_1_heading_7: What is the difference between e-sim and physical sim?
content_2_heading_7: There are no major differences between e-sim and physical sim. The features of both the sims are same. But the e-sim comes inbuilt in the device whereas physical sim can be removed.
content_3_heading_7: Can I change the service provider of cheapest e-sim Singapore?
content_4_heading_7: Yes, you can change the service provider of an e-sim by altering the device setting with best e-sim for Singapore.
content_5_heading_7: How can I activate an e-sim?
content_6_heading_7: Activating an e-sim is simple, after buying the mobile subscription, you receive a QR code via e-mail. Thereby, scan the code through your phone and download the profile.
content_7_heading_7: Can I use both e-sim and sim on the same phone?
content_8_heading_7: Yes, if your phone supports both the version of sims. You can use both the e-sim and sim on the same phone.
